text: Vallas is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Léon Vallas (1879–1956), musicologist and biographer *Alexander Max(imilian) Vallas (1884– ca. 1943), Austrian illustrator and poet *Jean-Louis Vallas (1901–1995), French poet *Paul Vallas (born 1953), American school administrator *Spyros Vallas (born 1981), Greek football player
title: Vallas (surname)
